name: Doko Ni Ikimasu Ka
description:
In Doko Ni Ikimasu Ka you will play as a guide that has to take lost people to the places they want to go inside of a district. Controls - WASD - Move Mouse - Look Around E / Left Click - Interaction The player have 5 in-game hours (5 minutes) to take as many people as possible to their desired spots.

Game made for the Global Game Jam '21.

Credits - 

Mardan Prado (@MardanGameDev) - Programming, dessign and development.

Ayesha L.M. (@NextAeris)- Art
